name: Juicy Pipes
description:
Swipe a column left or right to move pieces horizontally. Click a piece to rotate it clockwise. Collect errand fruits for bonus points!

Team:

Henri Sarasvirta - coding, design

Kimmo Seitz - 3D art, design

Antti Ruonala - 3D art, design, original concept

Matti Isotalo - 2D art, SFX, particles, design
